entry.title: Harry Horton endorsed by outgoing Tory
entry.summary: 27 May, 2024 Telford Constituency Outgoing Telford MP Lucy Allan has been suspended from the Conservative Party after endorsing the Reform candidate Harry Horton: I…
entry.content:
27 May, 2024 Telford Constituency Outgoing Telford MP Lucy Allan has been suspended from the Conservative Party after endorsing the Reform candidate Harry Horton:

I am supporting Alan Adams to be Telfordâ€™s next MP. If you want to help Alan or donate to his campaign, sign up on his website http://alanadams.co.uk

Sources: https://x.com/lucyallan/status/1795110435655463196 https://order-order.com/2024/05/27/outgoing-tory-mp-endorses-reform-candidate/
